AD.name: MongoDB Server
AD.description: Semicolon separated list of MongoDB Server names and ports. Example tuna:27001;tuna:27002;tuna:27003

AD.name: MongoDB Database Name
AD.description: Name of the MongoDB database to use.

AD.name: MongoDB User Name
AD.description: Optional name of the MongoDB User.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of iRouter components that will be wired together. (If no iRouter functionality is required this value is ignored.)

AD.name: Consumable scopes
AD.description: Comma delimited list of scope names for consumed animal, measurement, and position products. (If no iRouter functionality is required this value is ignored.)

AD.name: Premises URI
AD.description: Universal Resource Identifier(URI) of the Tracker Premises. This is the Premises URI that will be used for saving consumed iRouter Animal, Tag and Event products.

AD.name: Type
AD.description: The default type of animal to add as a new animal, for saving consumed iRouter event products where there is not already a prexisting animal.

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label the node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics. This optional attribute has no functionality other than to visualize and document this service in the iRouter Monitor.
